name: Asteroid Shooter (Wei-Fan Chen)
description:
Asteroid Shooter!

Warning! Warning! The Asteroid Impact is coming!

Your hyper-energy spaceship is facing the most dangerous Asteroid Impact! Do your best to survive from them as long as possible. Your life is all depend on your driving and shooting skills!

The Game
  • Survive as long as possible to get higher score
  • Big asteroid count 50 score
  • Middle asteroid count 100 score
  • Small asteroid count 500 score, shoot them down!
Controls 
  • Left/Right: Steer
  • X: Shoot 
  • Up/Z/C: Boost
  • Down: Slow down
Credits
  • Code, Pixel Art, and Music by Wei-Fan Chen
  • Twitter:  @weifanchen_
